name: BoxLab
description:
Controls:

  • Space to place box at red space and respawn
  • A/D to move left/right
  • W to jump
  • ESC to reset level if you blocked your path

The idea of the game is that you can create your own path. I didn't make many levels, but made the last level a little confusing on purpose so you actually have to kinda explore and think.

Made for the LOWREZJAM 2021 - I joined like 2 days before deadline because I found the idea cool and wanted to try it out and made this very bad prototype of a game (which is also the first game I actually uploaded)
